Class ModelFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ModelFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModel, IScore

    public final class ModelFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements IModel

    The Class ModelFacade

    It provides a facade of the Model component.

    1.0
